    Services

    Our Services

    Every engagement is designed to move your operations from chaos toward calm. We meet you where you are and build toward where you need to be.

    ## Chaos Assessment

    Discover where excitement is hiding

    A comprehensive audit that maps your operational chaos. We identify the hidden complexity, undocumented dependencies, and heroic workarounds that are stealing your team's time and sanity. ### What You Get
    • Infrastructure topology mapping
    • Incident pattern analysis (6-12 months)
    • Dependency and risk identification
    • Prioritized remediation roadmap
    • Executive summary with ROI projections
    **Typical Duration:** 2-4 weeks **Ideal For:** Teams experiencing frequent incidents or scaling pains
    ## Infrastructure Audit

    Know what you actually have

    Most organizations cannot answer basic questions about their infrastructure. This audit creates a complete, accurate inventory and identifies drift, security gaps, and cost optimization opportunities. ### What You Get
    • Complete infrastructure inventory
    • Configuration drift analysis
    • Security posture assessment
    • Cost optimization report
    • IaC coverage evaluation
    **Typical Duration:** 1-3 weeks **Ideal For:** Organizations with inherited or undocumented infrastructure
    ## BoringOps Transformation

    From chaos to calm

    A structured engagement that transforms your operations from reactive firefighting to proactive stability. We implement the BoringOps methodology end-to-end, building the processes, tooling, and culture for sustainable calm. ### What You Get
    • Runbook development and automation
    • Monitoring and alerting overhaul
    • Incident response process design
    • On-call rotation optimization
    • Knowledge transfer and training
    **Typical Duration:** 3-6 months **Ideal For:** Teams ready to invest in lasting operational excellence
    ## Incident Response Retainer

    Expert backup when you need it

    Sometimes you need an experienced hand during the crisis, not after. This retainer provides on-demand access to senior expertise for critical incidents, with guaranteed response times. ### What You Get
    • Priority incident response (4-hour SLA)
    • Post-incident review facilitation
    • Monthly operational health check
    • Quarterly strategy session
    **Typical Duration:** Ongoing retainer **Ideal For:** Lean teams or those with complex, critical systems
    ## Platform Engineering

    Build the boring foundation

    Design and implement an internal developer platform that makes the right way the easy way. Golden paths, self-service infrastructure, and guardrails that enable velocity without chaos. ### What You Get
    • Platform strategy and architecture
    • Developer experience assessment
    • Golden path implementation
    • Self-service tooling setup
    • Documentation and adoption plan
    **Typical Duration:** 2-4 months **Ideal For:** Growing engineering organizations (50+ developers)
    ## BoringOps Training

    Teach your team to embrace boring

    Hands-on workshops that instill the BoringOps mindset and practices. From incident management to infrastructure-as-code, we train teams to operate with calm confidence. ### What You Get
    • Customized curriculum design
    • Live workshop delivery (remote or on-site)
    • Practical exercises and labs
    • Assessment and certification
    • Reference materials and playbooks
    **Typical Duration:** 1-5 days **Ideal For:** Teams adopting new practices or onboarding rapidly

    Not Sure Where to Start?

    Most engagements begin with a Chaos Assessment. It is the fastest way to understand your current state and prioritize what matters.

    Let's Map Your Chaos

    A 2-4 week engagement that delivers clarity and a concrete roadmap.

    Schedule a Chaos Assessment

    Engagement Models

    Project-Based

    Fixed scope, fixed timeline, fixed price. Best for assessments and discrete transformations. You know exactly what you are getting and when.

    Retainer

    Ongoing advisory and support. Guaranteed response times, monthly check-ins, strategic guidance. Best for organizations that want continuous operational improvement.

    Embedded

    We work as an extension of your team for a defined period. Deep integration, maximum knowledge transfer. Best for complex transformations or teams building internal capability.
